page.title: 17ATTITUDES
page.content: Quotes to the question:- "How would you describe the area?" i.e. the new town area. 1. A pleasant town but lacking in enough places for the young to go to 2. As a punishment. 3. Could be better if there were enough jobs for the unemployed. 4. It could be very nice if people would make more effort to keep it clean and tidy. 5. Could be a lovely place if the people who live here took more pride in the place. 6. A depressing area. 7. Has an undeserved bad reputation. 8. A nightmare from an architect's drawingboard. 9. It would be lovely if everything matched up to the beautiful trees and shrubs that have been planted.
